item.title: My Understanding of RInno
item.description: In today's post I want to go over RInno for deploying Shiny apps to desktop as well as the benefits and how to get it all going.

item.title: I Generated the Potionmaster Teacher's Dashboard
item.description: This is a thing I made: https://mpawliw-levac.shinyapps.io/potionmaster/ Why did I make it?
